title: @Riot, give us a SENSIBLE reason why you won't let us permanently change our announcer voice.
body: Other MOBAs do it, you have the technology, many people want it, why won't you do it? Bring Gangplank announcer voice back and make new ones like Kench, Sol, Jinx, Graves, etc., let us permanently change our announcer pack. You have another good idea you can profit from, you can sell them for both RP and IP.

replies.body:
You can literally change your announcer as long as you have the a file.

Guide on how to install the GP announcer: https://www.reddit.com/r/gangplankmains/comments/5pdsr2/reworked_the_recreation_of_the_gp_announcer/

Same for other announcer packs, just use a different file.
That's all fine and dandy but that's fan work. But I do wanna install it. Is that actually legal? As far as I know tampering with the game's files gives you a permaban.

>As far as I know tampering with the game's files gives you a permaban.

Only if the modification gives you a competitive advantage will you get banned.

Many streamers out there use custom HUDS and they are perfectly fine.

People change the splash files to other art they find better, and they've been fine.

I truly truly hope Riot starts making them soon, starting by bringing GP announcer voice back, he said cool stuff, too.

So, I'm just going to say this:

Will Riot read this post?

Possibly.  They do read some of the threads, and they might take what you ask into consideration.

Will Riot respond to this post?

No.  They won't give you an answer, and they may not actually talk about it for a long while.  If they do talk about it soon, it'll only be after the Dark Star game. Maybe a week after.  Otherwise, it'll probably be months.

Why would Riot not respond to said post?

Your post subject is accusatory and not conversational.  It's conversation material for non-rioters, but if a red badge shows up, they might come under fire.  The way it's set up suggests that you won't accept any answer that isn't "We will" or "Soon TM"


Just my 2 cents.

I had to word it that way because this is not a new topic. For ages people have asked for this kind of things and they never have answered, as far as I know. I would honestly prefer a detailed answer from them about why they can't or won't do something instead of absolute silence. In addition to announcer packs, needless to say, people have also asked for the option to change the login screen to any of the previous ones since the beginning of League. These things are details, they may be insignificant to some people, but they make the game more attractive.

Probably for the same reasons why Voice updates will take a while. It takes a lot of scheduling to get voice actors in and do lines, where they normally do that for expensive skins, new champs and reworks. Also as someone said, with the new client, it could be possible in the future.
I would gladly buy the tyler1 announcer pack

Do they have the technology?

I mean, even aside from League spaghetti code, it can be hard to implement features you don't already have.

It might be that they would have to do significant changes to not have everyone have the same announcer.

Of course they have the technology. The current Thresh announcer can be toggled off at will, you're not forced to use it. All they have to do is add an extra menu to let you choose the announcer voice you want from the ones you own (aside from developing the announcer packs, of course).

I mean specifically for individual players, as opposed to the entire server or game. Idk, it feels like it might be a [small matter of programming.](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Small_matter_of_programming)

And unless I'm mistaken, the Thresh announcer toggle off is a total mute.
